content.rendered:
Enjoy a wide range of features and services that will help you bank smarter; like ATM fee refunds, account rewards and a great mobile banking app!

 

*Electronic withdrawals, transfers or checks by preauthorized, telephone, computer or similar order to third parties are limited to six per statement cycle.

**You must deposit $10.00 to open this account. The Primary Account owner must be within 16-22 years of age. We will refund an aggregate of $25.00 for nationwide ATM withdrawal fees imposed by other financial institutions and incurred during the monthly statement cycle. Generally, the refund will be credited to your account within 2 business days. When the primary account holder reaches the age of 23, the Student Checking account will automatically convert into a checking account, disclosures will be provided at that time. Please note that rates, fees, and balance requirements may vary based on the account available at that time.

We make it easy to open an account at Country Bank. Open your account online and skip the drive to the branch or stop by any of our 14 branch locations and our friendly, knowledgeable team will be delighted to assist you.

We are here to help! If you have additional questions, please fill out our Contact Us Form and we will be in touch just as soon as we can.

Additional Services:

  • Safe Deposit Boxes
  • Money Orders and Treasurer’s Checks
  • Foreign and Domestic Wire Transfers
  • Bank-by-Mail
  • Complimentary Notary Services
  • Medallion Signature Guarantees for customers, please review the Medallion Stamp Customer Checklist
